Regulation Name(s): Culture medium for antimicrobial susceptibility tests
Analyte(s): Extended Spectrum Beta Lactamase (ESBL)-producing Escherichia coli
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Remel Spectra ESBL selective chromogenic medium for detection and presumptive identification of ESBL-producing bacteria from fecal and perirectal swab specimens.
Indications for Use Summary: Selective and differential medium for primary isolation and presumptive identification of ESBL-producing E. coli, K. pneumoniae, K. oxytoca, and P. mirabilis to aid in prevention and control in healthcare settings; not for diagnosis or treatment monitoring.
